is.merkor.core.redis.dictionaries
Class RedisClusterMemberDictionary

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.redis.dictionaries.RedisClusterMemberDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusterMemberDictionary
public class RedisClusterMemberDictionary
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterMemberDictionary

An implementation of the ClusterMemberDictionary interface to access ClusterMembers stored in Redis format.

Version:
0.8
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

Description copied from interface: ClusterMemberDictionary
Retrieves the domain names for lemma. Returns a Map whith domain names as keys and Items having lemma as lemma as values.

Specified by:
